title: What are some good ideas for a hardware startup? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hardware and services are tools. We are tool using animals. To make good hardware or any other kind of product or service we need to get an insight into what could be made better. What tool is missing? What could be done easier? simpler? better? less expensively? more sustainably? faster? Who will this help? How many of them are there? What is it worth to them? What problem does it solve? What does it make better? faster? cheaper? more luxurious? fun? exciting? What can actually be done or delivered? Really? Really?  When? Will it be soon enough? How will people find out about it? find it? try it? Do you need partners? What are their needs? How much will it cost? How much will be needed to get this done? What team is needed to get this done? Do we know them? Can we find them? Is our idea and ability to execute it good enough?
